Occ:so he can replace limbs? it was incenerated  shoulder i doubt he could 
but it back on....

  Galvatron(im not posting that he has his arm back on until my argument is 
replied to) saw the bots arm fall. He felt the cut through his tail. It cut 
off the very bottom and that was all. The dna of dark mouse healed it over 
quickly so the pain was in and out in a matter of a minute. The bot had 
slipped out of his hands.  He jeted full speed. With the bots slow speed due 
to damage he was able to reach the ground right before the bot did he was 
behind him now. The bot didnt see him move because he was in the  
transformation  to his beast mode and back to robot mode when he made his 
move. He caught the bot as he landed.  His arms with  full force through each 
of his sides with his sharp dragon claws digging in. His tail wrapped the 
bots legs pulling him down on the ground. The bot was severly damages. His 
mech fluid flowed in galvatron's body.  He had fallen with the bot with his 
hands tearing up his internal machinery. In the middle of the fall to the 
ground galvatron's mouth had opened to its full length and chomped the bots 
intire head and pulled straight up. His jewel had been glowing with an 
enormous light since the cutting of his tail. Due to the immense power up the 
green energy  it blaste in two diffrent directions with equal power to the 
first. One hit the bots lower back the other cutting through the bots right 
leg. With such damage he should be in stasis lock soon enough.
